title: Buying Riot Points
body: In Somehow if i try to buy riot points it doesnt work for Ideal, ING. if i log in with my ING on lol then it gives me a white screen, now i cant buy riot points. someone help me in this i think this is a bug or something

replies.body:
This is happening as a result of changes they've made on their side. I recommend reaching out to [iDEAL](https://www.ideal.nl/) about this.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
